councilor_eager_explorers_desc: The $TITLE$ is in charge of special studies and expeditions.
councilor_efficient_bureaucracy_desc: The $TITLE$ is in charge of streamlining all administrative processes.
councilor_environmentalist_desc: The $TITLE$ protects the environment and those living in harmony with it.
councilor_exalted_priesthood_desc: The $TITLE$ presides over the religious council and guards against heresy.
councilor_fanatic_purifiers_desc: The $TITLE$ ensures resources are available to sustain military operations.
councilor_feudal_realm_desc: The $TITLE$ oversees the distribution of power and titles among subjects.
councilor_franchising_desc: The $TITLE$ is responsible for expansion into new locations and markets.
councilor_free_haven_desc: The $TITLE$ is in charge of integration and employment of new citizens.
councilor_free_traders_desc: The $TITLE$ supervises trade with other empires.
councilor_functional_architecture_desc: The $TITLE$ ensures simplicity and lean practices are upheld and valued.
councilor_gospel_of_the_masses_desc: The $TITLE$ is in charge of spreading the gospel.
councilor_idealistic_foundation_desc: The $TITLE$ protects the rights of citizens, building trust in society and government.
councilor_idyllic_bloom_desc: The $TITLE$ oversees all Gaia Seeder initiatives.
councilor_imperial_cult_desc: The $TITLE$ is in charge of our spiritual narrative.
councilor_indentured_assets_desc: The $TITLE$ ensures efficiency in the trade of indentured assets.
councilor_inwards_perfection_desc: The $TITLE$ is in charge of the vigilant watch protecting our borders.
councilor_media_conglomerate_desc: The $TITLE$ runs promotional campaigns for the government.
councilor_memory_vaults_desc: The $TITLE$ is responsible for maintaining vast archives of knowledge stored deep in vaults, and distributing this knowledge to those who seek it.
councilor_merchant_guilds_desc: The $TITLE$ is responsible for generating trade.
councilor_meritocracy_desc: The $TITLE$ oversees training and development for all important leaders.
councilor_mining_guilds_desc: The $TITLE$ represents the mining guilds, whose influence helps to maintain order.
councilor_nationalistic_zeal_desc: The $TITLE$ is the champion and pride of our society.
councilor_naval_contractors_desc: The $TITLE$ negotiates contracts for the navy.
councilor_parliamentary_system_desc: The $TITLE$ ensures our parliament is focusing on the most relevant issues.
councilor_permanent_employment_desc: The $TITLE$ commissions and oversees new workers.
councilor_philosopher_king_desc: The $TITLE$ serves to advise the council in all matters.
councilor_pleasure_seekers_desc: The $TITLE$ wields a substantial budget for keeping the privileged lavishly entertained.
councilor_police_state_desc: The $TITLE$ ensures any internal threats or dissidents within our society are swiftly dealt with.
councilor_pompous_purists_desc: The $TITLE$ is a ceremonial position for impressing alien dignitaries.
councilor_private_military_companies_des: The $TITLE$ maintains civilian order via private military organizations.
councilor_private_prospectors_desc: The $TITLE$ coordinates expansion efforts when claiming new systems.
councilor_privatized_exploration_desc: The $TITLE$ is in charge of constructing and maintaining orbital stations.
councilor_public_relations_specialists_d: The $TITLE$ is responsible for improving our public image on the galactic stage.
councilor_reanimated_armies_desc: The $TITLE$ guards the secret arts and ordains new necromancers.
councilor_relentless_industrialists_desc: The $TITLE$ will exploit anyone and anything to ensure industrial expansion.
councilor_ruthless_competition_desc: The $TITLE$ thrives under pressure and will stop at nothing to prove their worth.
councilor_scavengers_desc: The $TITLE$ is in charge of refining the salvaging process of scavenged ships.
councilor_shadow_council_desc: Officially, the $TITLE$ is merely an observer, but may have a hidden agenda.
councilor_shared_burden_desc: The $TITLE$ makes sure any grievances are settled promptly.
councilor_slaver_guilds_desc: The $TITLE$ oversees the treatment of slaves, to prevent unnecessary violence.
councilor_technocracy_desc: The $TITLE$ ensures fundamental research is promoted and shared between departments.
councilor_toxic_baths_desc: The $TITLE$ promotes the importance and benefits of the bathing rituals.
councilor_trading_posts_desc: The $TITLE$ is in charge of coordinating trade route scheduling to optimize capacity.
councilor_warrior_culture_desc: The $TITLE$ is responsible for maintaining dueling etiquette, and overseeing the correct execution of warfare protocols.
councilor_memory_vault_corporate_desc: Dealers of Knowledge are responsible for maintaining the vast vault archives. They distribute the knowledge to those who are willing to pay for it.
councilor_crusader_spirit_corporate_desc: Acquisition Officers are constantly headhunting for promising privateers and those with plundering experience who could expand our operations.
councilor_task_delegation_corporate_desc: The Chief Posting Officer is responsible for the efficient handling of all delegation assignments.
councilor_private_healthcare_corporate_d: The Pharmaceutical Executive is the representative for all healthcare corporations.
councilor_heroic_tales_desc: Stories from the past contain much wisdom. Grand Storytellers inspire the population with traditional heroic tales.
councilor_dystopian_society_desc: The Primary Overseer seeks out corruption and extinguishes it before it can spread.
councilor_gestalt_growth_desc: The $TITLE$ is where important hive decisions are made.
councilor_gestalt_cognitive_desc: The $TITLE$ is where we develop our understanding of the world around us.
councilor_gestalt_legion_desc: The $TITLE$ is where decisions concerning galactic expansion are made.
councilor_gestalt_regulatory_desc: The $TITLE$ is where we counter the emergence of deviant consciousnesses.
couniclor_machine_governor_desc: $TITLE$: Units shall aquire all available worlds.
couniclor_machine_scientist_desc: $TITLE$: Data needs to be gathered and analyzed.
councilor_machine_admiral_servitor_desc: $TITLE$: All threats will be extermin§R'¿°éü¿T (( (+ÇÄ§! pampered.
councilor_psionic_sovereign_desc: First channeled by the Psi-Corps, the $TITLE$ provides a conduit for the Chosen One's vast psionic potential.
councilor_psionic_sovereign_conditional_: Leader has the §YPsionic§! or a §YChosen§! Trait.
councilor_galactic_sovereign_desc: The $TITLE$ maintains operatives throughout the Galactic Imperium, monitoring any suspicious behavior.
council_agenda_agenda_infinite_opportuni: Let's promote and celebrate our technological achievements.
council_agenda_agenda_unlock_slot_desc: We should expand our government to support an additional councilor.
council_agenda_agenda_idle_desc: Lacking a specific focus, we deal with smaller, otherwise deferred issues.
council_agenda_agenda_reorganize_council: Due to changes in government focus, we should reorganize the Council to focus on other matters.
council_agenda_agenda_augmentation_produ: Major cyber implant-based product launch preceded by a period of unprofitable conceptualization, development and testing.
council_agenda_agenda_we_come_in_peace_d: Ensure that non-aggression permeates our society and diplomatic relations.
council_agenda_agenda_display_of_power_d: Our neighbors will know we are prepared for war if necessary.
council_agenda_agenda_open_arms_desc: We are all citizens of the same galaxy. Everyone should feel welcome within our borders.
council_agenda_agenda_strong_on_our_own_: We cannot rely on others, and must focus on making ourselves stronger.
council_agenda_agenda_give_and_take_desc: Our political climate must encourage compromises and respect for differing views.
council_agenda_agenda_preserve_the_order: For us to truly prosper as a society, people must respect the judgment of the regime.
council_agenda_agenda_a_higher_purpose_d: In our faith we must find comfort, purpose and direction.
council_agenda_agenda_progressive_growth: The only practical way to satisfy our desire for growth is through manufacturing it.
council_agenda_agenda_finding_the_voice_: Millions of impressions and conclusions overwhelm us. Learning to filter out all but the most important voices takes effort, but also makes us more efficient.
council_agenda_agenda_conquer_nature_des: We can adapt to our surroundings, but in the end nature will bend to our will.
council_agenda_agenda_build_relations_de: Only through building trust can we create a better future.
council_agenda_agenda_chart_the_unknown_: We must fervently chart all the mysteries of the galaxy.
council_agenda_agenda_civil_exclusion_de: Citizenship requirements are temporarily adjusted, raising expectations of those within our borders.
There is an accepted deviancy level among our simple drones, as some divergences can result in raised productivity.
council_agenda_agenda_superior_colonies_: We make substantial logistical efforts to support the development of our new colonies.
agenda_superior_colonies_planet_boost_de: This colony has substantial development support due to a Council Agenda.
council_agenda_agenda_inner_stability_de: A shared vision brings us harmony despite our differing values.
council_agenda_agenda_open_markets_desc: We commit entirely to maximizing the benefits for all involved parties in our Commercial Pacts.
council_agenda_agenda_favored_society_de: We choose to provide special dispensation to citizens living and working on our Capital.
council_agenda_agenda_departmental_effic: We streamline council departments by rebuilding them from the ground up.
The Mind and Councilor Nodes can each temporarily be forced into a heightened state of efficiency.
We can temporarily overclock our highest priority Processing Nodes, to gain efficiency.
council_agenda_agenda_rightful_claims_de: Through political procedure and streamlined bureaucracy, we are better suited to manipulate our rivals.
council_agenda_agenda_evolving_society_d: Ideas and theories for new ways to improve ourselves must be discussed and pursued with fervor.
Ideas and theories for new ways to improve ourselves must be prioritized.
New procedures and methods for maintaining and running our units must be prioritized.
council_agenda_agenda_oppose_the_fallen_: Studying these imposing threats will allow us to adapt our forces before a confrontation can arise.
council_agenda_agenda_uncover_secrets_de: We pursue all means possible of gaining information on anyone and everything.
council_agenda_agenda_military_buildup_d: By acting decisively, we stand prepared for any threats.
council_agenda_agenda_impenetrable_borde: We will prepare for the worst and be ready, should our territory ever be threatened.
Increased chance of Starbase research options.
council_agenda_agenda_leadership_conditi: All our leaders spend, willingly or not, considerable time and effort on introspection and behavioral retraining.
All unique, and benevolent, aspects of our leaders are gathered and unified into our higher consciousness.
All optimal non-standard procedures from leader units are analyzed, filtered, and finally combined with our core.
council_agenda_agenda_pioneer_politics_d: The [global_event_country.GetGalCommunityOrGalImperium] will recognize and praise our absolute commitment to them.
council_agenda_agenda_psionic_supremacy_: We must inspire and assure our people of the great destiny our Psionic powers will lead us to.
council_agenda_agenda_genetic_pursuit_de: We must focus our efforts to achieve absolute genetic perfection.
council_agenda_agenda_cybernetic_advanta: We must ensure that our best Cybernetic enhancements are made available to everyone within our borders.
We must ensure that our best Cybernetic enhancements are distributed and installed properly among everyone within our borders.
council_agenda_agenda_synthetic_yield_de: Any doubt regarding the superiority of our synthetics must be cast aside.
council_agenda_agenda_self_maintenance_d: Permit local clustering and patching of environmental adaptation protocols.
council_agenda_agenda_gestalt_boost_grow: Coordinating our drones and colonies must be prioritized.
council_agenda_agenda_gestalt_boost_cogn: Analysis and existential understanding must be prioritized.
council_agenda_agenda_gestalt_boost_legi: Controlling the boundaries of our territory in space must be prioritized.
council_agenda_agenda_gestalt_purge_trai: Distracting data points, and false conclusions hinder our reasoning skills. We must purge all redundant information.
Removes §HNegative Traits§! from Ruler and Councilor Nodes.\nFor each Trait removed, lose §R$@agenda_gestalt_purge_traits_exp_change|0$§! experience.
